footer.description: VisuScan is an AI-powered web application for image analysis. It allows users to upload and analyze images.

hero.title: Scan Your Images
hero.description: Upload your images and let VisuScan analyze them for you with cutting-edge AI technology

aiGeneration.title: Discover the Invisible with Artificial Intelligence
aiGeneration.description: We analyze the finest details, objects, and text in your images in seconds using Google Gemini infrastructure.

features.title: Detailed Object Recognition
features.text: It detects and lists all objects, brands, and text in the image with 99% accuracy.

features.title: Security Filters
features.text: Automatically checks whether images comply with general morality or workplace rules.

features.title: Rapid Integration
features.text: Get your analysis results in JSON format and integrate them into your database or application immediately.

items.question: What is VisuScan?
items.answer: VisuScan is an AI-powered web application that allows users to upload and analyze images.

items.question: Which file formats do you support?
items.answer: We support common image file formats such as JPG, PNG, WEBP, and HEIC.

items.question: Are the images I uploaded safe?
items.answer: Yes, user privacy is important to us. All uploaded images are stored on our secure servers and are not shared with third parties.

items.question: Is this service paid?
items.answer: VisuScan is currently in Beta. It is completely free.

quickResult.title: Get Results in Seconds
quickResult.description: No complicated procedures are needed. Just drag and drop, and let artificial intelligence handle the rest. Designed to speed up your workflow.

steps.title: Upload Image
steps.desc: Drag and drop your PNG, JPG, or WebP file.

steps.title: Artificial Intelligence Analysis
steps.desc: The Gemini engine scans and interprets the image pixel by pixel.

steps.title: Download the Result
steps.desc: Copy the structured data or save it to your project file.

showInput.title: Start Visual Analysis
showInput.description: Upload the image you want to analyze below.

features.title: Easy Upload
features.text: Drag and drop your image or select from your files. We support PNG, JPG formats.

features.title: AI-Powered Analysis
features.text: Our advanced AI model analyzes the image in seconds and extracts details.

features.title: Safe and Fast
features.text: Your data is processed securely. Results are displayed on your screen instantly.

about.title: Making the Invisible Visible
about.description: VisuScan leverages AI-powered image analysis technologies to make sense of visual data in the digital world.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To enable everyone to quickly, accurately, and meaningfully gain insights from visual data using the latest AI technologies. Simplifying complex analysis processes to save time and resources.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To set a global standard in image processing. To be a leading platform that optimizes business processes, enhances security, and opens doors to new discoveries with our technology.

potential.title: Ready to Unlock the Potential of Your Images?
potential.description: Try VisuScan for free now and experience the power of AI in your own projects.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Please read these terms of service carefully before using VisuScan.

termsContent.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
termsContent.description: By accessing the VisuScan website or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, you should not use our services.

termsContent.title: 2. Service Description
termsContent.description: VisuScan is a web application that uses artificial intelligence technologies to analyze images uploaded by users. The service is provided "as is" and "as available."

termsContent.title: 3. User Responsibilities
termsContent.description: When using the service, you agree not to engage in the following actions:
list: Uploading illegal, harmful, threatening, obscene, hateful, or otherwise objectionable content.
Uploading content that infringes on the intellectual property rights of others.
Attempting to breach the security of the service or uploading viruses, worms, or other malicious software.
Attempting to reverse engineer the AI model.

children.title: 4.1. User Content
children.description: All rights to the images you upload belong to you. By uploading images to VisuScan, you grant us a temporary license to process these images solely for the purpose of providing the analysis service.

children.title: 4.2. VisuScan Content
children.description: The design, code, logo, and all software of the service are the property of VisuScan and are protected by copyright laws.

termsContent.title: 5. AI Disclaimer (Important)
termsContent.description: Although VisuScan uses the latest artificial intelligence technologies, AI is not infallible. Analysis results may not always be 100% accurate, complete, or reliable. Results provided by VisuScan are for informational purposes only and should not be relied upon for medical, legal, financial, or other critical decisions. It is the user's responsibility to verify the accuracy of the results.

termsContent.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
termsContent.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law, VisuScan shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or punitive damages arising from the use or inability to use the service.

termsContent.title: 7. Changes to Terms
termsContent.description: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes take effect as soon as they are posted on this page. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Your data security is our priority. We transparently explain how your information is processed when you use VisuScan.

privacyContent.title: 1. Introduction
privacyContent.description: At VisuScan ("we", "us", or "our"), we value your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains the information we collect when you use our website (visuscan.com) and AI-powered image analysis services, how we use that information, and how we protect it.

children.title: 2.1. Uploaded Images (Most Important)
children.description: Images you upload to use our service are processed temporarily solely for the purpose of performing the analysis. Once the analysis is complete and results are presented to you, the uploaded images are immediately and permanently deleted from our servers. We never store, retain, or share your images with third parties.

children.title: 2.2. Usage Data and Cookies
children.description: We may collect standard log data about how you use our service. This may include technical information such as your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and time of visit. We use this data to improve our service, ensure security, and for analytics purposes.

privacyContent.title: 3. How We Use Your Information?
list: Providing and maintaining the AI-powered image analysis service.
Ensuring the security of our service and preventing misuse.

privacyContent.title: 4. Third-Party Service Providers
privacyContent.description: We may utilize trusted third-party AI providers (e.g., Google Gemini API) to perform image analysis. Your images are transmitted to these providers in encrypted form only for the duration of the analysis. These providers do not use your data to train their own models.

privacyContent.title: 5. Data Security
privacyContent.description: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. All data transmissions are secured with SSL/TLS encryption.

privacyContent.title: 6. Contact
privacyContent.description:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
Email: privacy@visuscan.com
